Instructions

  • Dial one of the access number listed below
  • Follow the prompts to select language and enter PIN
  • When you are asked to dial your destination number,
    • For domestic calls: Dial 1 + area code + phone number and then press the # key
    • For international calls: Dial 011 + country code + city code + phone number and then press the # key

NOTE: NEVER press the "SEND" button after you enter the destination number if you are calling from your cell phone otherwise the call may be terminated by your mobile carrier and not by us.

Access Numbers


(*) No Pin: Your phone number is registered in our system the first time you call, after that you don't need to enter a PIN to make a call since our system will recognize your number associated with your PIN.
      Pin needed: You will be asked for your PIN every time you call using this access number.
